lexUnit.name: enthralling.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: capturing the attention of, captivating

sentence.text: But nobody coaches or motivates quite like Barrington and his personality , almost as much as Parke 's burgeoning promise , was written all over this enthralling match .
Such a heroic venture requires heroic singing , and that is where it seemed this enthralling evening would fall short of its target .
Robert Henderson reviews an enthralling staging of The Fiery Angel
But Prokofiev 's opera owes just as much of its enthralling power to the brilliance of its orchestral writing , and in Edward Downes it has a superlative master of the composer 's idiomatic style .
Despite the crowds and exterior complex of manager 's house , souvenir shop , ticket office and litter baskets , White Scar Cave is an enthralling experience .
Harvest was a particularly enthralling experience .
Come rain or shine , you are sure of a perfect pitch with this enthralling game -- No ` Rain stopped play " signs here !
It was enthralling entertainment prompted by United 's need to gamble and attack in the second half .
IT HAS to be said -- a compulsory retreat was not an enthralling prospect .
Leeds , producing another inspired display in an enthralling match , were denied by exceptional goalkeeping from Andy Goram .
In an enthralling match in which Bailey served nine aces in the first set and with a tie-break in the final set , the match was poised for either player to win .
“ It 's A Shame … ” is the title track from the Lemonheads ' enthralling album and it 's beautiful .
• Fiji flood alert ! — Nick Cain reports on a rain-drenched but enthralling event
From there , they progressed to the enthralling problem of human and divine love .
It was an enthralling , unforgettable sight for a small , romantically minded boy .
During an enthralling series of Singles matches there were more fluctuations than on an average day on Wall Street .

One of the greatest love stories of all time and amongst the most enthralling romances in literature -- JANE EYRE is compulsive entertainment for both those who know the story and for those to whom it is unfamiliar .
Turina 's Three Fantasy Dances are brilliantly imaginative impressions of Spain creating in Pizarro 's hands , a magnificent finale to an evening of enthralling pianism .
They meet at McDiarmid Park in what promises to be a most enthralling encounter .
Aberdeen 's debt to Booth was even greater ten minutes from time when he scored the goal that finally ended an enthralling tie .
